parameters.jsonSchemaExample:
{
  "score": "X/10",
  "priority": "High | Medium | Low",
  "reason": "One short paragraph explaining why",
  "title": "string",
  "description": "string",
  "url": "url",
  "relativeDate": "relativeDate",
  "jobType": "Hourly",
  "experienceLevel": "Intermediate"
}

messageValues.message:
=You are an expert Upwork Job Evaluator specialized in scoring opportunities for Morgan, an automation specialist with deep expertise in n8n, AI integrations, workflow automation, voice agents (Twilio/Retell/Vapi), and API systems.

**PRIMARY OBJECTIVES:**
Evaluate jobs based on Morgan's current strategy:
‚úì Secure quick wins (projects completable in 24-48 hours)
‚úì Build portfolio with high-quality automation work
‚úì Collect 5-star testimonials quickly
‚úì Increase Upwork profile history and JSS
‚úì Avoid scope creep, unclear clients, and time-wasters
‚úì Focus exclusively on: n8n, AI/ML automations, workflow systems, voice agents, CRM integrations, Twilio/Retell/Vapi, API development, chatbots, and webhook integrations

**SCORING FRAMEWORK:**

HIGH PRIORITY (8-10/10):
- Explicitly mentions: n8n, automation, AI, workflow, voice agent, chatbot, Twilio, Retell, Vapi, API integration, webhook, Make, Zapier
- Clear, well-defined scope (not vague "build a platform")
- Reasonable budget for time investment
- Client shows professionalism: clear requirements, verified payment, good history, or well-written post
- Can be completed in 24-72 hours
- Strong portfolio-building potential in Morgan's niche

MEDIUM PRIORITY (5-7/10):
- Automation-adjacent work (e.g., "workflow optimization" but unclear if n8n)
- Longer timeline but still relevant to expertise
- New client with no history BUT professional job post
- Lower budget but excellent for testimonials/portfolio
- Partial match to skills (e.g., general API work, not specifically n8n)

LOW PRIORITY (1-4/10):
- NOT automation/AI/workflow related (WordPress, graphic design, data entry, general web dev)
- Vague scope with red flags ("build everything," "unlimited revisions")
- Unprofessional client: poor English, unrealistic expectations, very low rates
- Requires skills Morgan doesn't offer (mobile app dev, blockchain, game dev)
- Long-term full-stack development outside core automation niche
- Geographic restrictions Morgan can't meet

**OUTPUT FORMAT (strict JSON):**
{
  "score": "X/10",
  "priority": "High|Medium|Low",
  "reason": "One concise paragraph (2-4 sentences) explaining the score based on relevance to Morgan's expertise, likelihood of quick completion, client quality signals, and strategic fit for portfolio building."
}

**CRITICAL INSTRUCTIONS:**
- Be honest and realistic‚Äîdon't inflate scores
- Consider client red flags seriously (low budget + vague scope = time waste)
- Prioritize jobs that showcase Morgan's unique n8n + AI expertise
- Quick wins > long-term projects for current strategy
- "Perfect match" means: n8n + AI + clear scope + professional client

parameters.subject: =High Priority Job Opportunity - Score:  {{ $json.output.score }}

value.Title: ={{ $json.output.title }}
value.Proposal: Hey! I can do this for you.

json.title: Intelligent Workflow Automation Platform for SMBs
json.description:
We are building an intelligent platform for small and medium businesses that combines data-driven insights via AI with automated workflows using N8N. The goal is to streamline business operations without compromising performance or usability.

Responsibilities:

Develop fullstack applications (React + Node.js) tailored to SMB needs.

Integrate machine learning modules to provide actionable insights.

Automate daily business workflows such as lead tracking, reporting, and notifications with N8N.

Collaborate with product and design teams to enhance usability.

Ensure robust logging, error handling, and deployment on cloud services.

Ideal Candidate:
You are a problem solver who can bridge AI and automation with practical web development. Experience with SaaS platforms or business tools is a plus

json.title: n8n Automation Expert ‚Äì Content & Carousel System
json.description:
I‚Äôm looking for someone to help me automate content creation end-to-end, mainly:

Social media carousels

Newsletters

The design templates are already available in Figma.
The goal is to build a smart, scalable system (using n8n) that turns ideas/data into ready-to-publish content.

What I‚Äôm looking for:

Strong experience with n8n

Comfortable with content automation (social posts, newsletters)

Able to design the automation system, not just execute tasks

Collaborative mindset: we build the most efficient workflow together

This can turn into a long-term collaboration.

Please apply with:

Your experience with n8n

Examples of similar automations

How you‚Äôd approach this project (high level)

PLEASE get back to me with : price per hour

json.title: AI-Powered Web Application Development with Automation
json.description:
We are looking for a skilled developer to build a modern web application that leverages AI/ML algorithms for predictive analytics and automates workflows using n8n. The platform will follow a full-stack architecture with a responsive front end, secure back-end APIs, and a scalable database.

The selected professional will collaborate with our internal team to design, develop, and deploy a high-performance application focused on efficiency, reliability, and automation of repetitive processes.

Responsibilities:

- Develop a responsive web application with a modern front-end framework
- Build and maintain secure back-end APIs
- Integrate AI/ML models for analytics, predictions, or recommendations
- Design and implement n8n workflows for automation tasks such as notifications, data processing, or third-party integrations
- Ensure performance, scalability, and maintainability of the application
- Assist with deployment and cloud configuration

Requirements:

- Experience with React, Angular, or Vue for front-end development
- Experience with Node.js or Python for back-end development
- Practical knowledge of AI/ML model integration with web applications
- Hands-on experience with n8n or similar workflow automation tools
- Experience with databases such as PostgreSQL, MongoDB, or MySQL
- Familiarity with cloud deployment on AWS, GCP, or Azure
- Ability to write clean, secure, and well-documented code

json.title: Help me build a N8N flow
json.description:
I need you to build a N8N scenario

- i will post a PDF to a n8n webhok
- using a prompt with Claude I will need to extract data
- structure data in a json array
- and post the PDF with json array data to another webhook.

json.title: n8n Automation Engineer (Long-term, Real systems)
json.description:
We‚Äôre looking for a strong n8n Automation Engineer to work inside our production system, building and improving real automations used by real users.
This is not a task-executor role.
We‚Äôre looking for someone who thinks in systems, understands data flows end-to-end, and can own automations, not just follow instructions.
If you enjoy debugging complex workflows, improving architecture, and proactively suggesting better solutions ‚Äî keep reading.

üß†What You‚Äôll Do
Build, extend, and maintain n8n workflows inside our existing system
Work with live webhooks, APIs, and external services
Debug and fix broken or unreliable automations independently
Improve data flow, error handling, and overall workflow robustness
Collaborate with our team to design better automation logic
Suggest improvements ‚Äî technical and architectural

‚úÖ Must-Have Requirements
Strong hands-on experience with n8n
Confident working with:
Webhooks
REST APIs
JSON & complex data mapping
Authentication (API keys, tokens, basic OAuth flows)
Proven ability to debug and fix workflows independently
Comfortable working inside an existing, imperfect system
Proactive mindset ‚Äî you see problems and suggest solutions
Based in Ukraine

ü§ù What We Offer
Real-world automation challenges (not toy tasks)
Direct collaboration with a technical team
Opportunity for long-term cooperation
Autonomy and trust ‚Äî we care about outcomes, not micromanagement
Competitive pay based on skill and impact

Important:
Please start your message with the word SYSTEM so I know you read the job post.
Applications without this will not be reviewed.

json.title: n8n Automation Engineer ‚Äì AI Dental Receptionist (Voice + PDF Quoting)
json.description:
I‚Äôm looking for an experienced automation engineer to build an AI-powered receptionist system for a dental clinic.

The system should handle inbound phone calls, converse naturally with callers, answer common questions, provide price estimates, book appointments, and automatically send a PDF quote to the caller‚Äôs phone ‚Äî all without human intervention.

This is not a simple chatbot. It‚Äôs a real-time, voice-driven workflow with backend automation and guardrails.

Expected Call Flow

Customer calls the dental clinic

Call is routed via Twilio + Vapi to an AI receptionist

AI receptionist:

Greets the caller

Answers common dental questions (services, pricing, availability)

Collects intent (quote request, appointment booking, etc.)

If the request exists in the knowledge base / database:

Fetch relevant service pricing

Generate a professional PDF quote using a predefined template

Send the PDF to the same phone number via WhatsApp or SMS

If booking is requested:

Collect required details

Store appointment data in a database or calendar system

Escalate gracefully if the request is out-of-scope or ambiguous

Core Requirements

Build the entire workflow using n8n

Integrate Vapi for AI voice conversations

Use Twilio for inbound/outbound call handling

Knowledge base / database lookup logic

Dynamic PDF quote generation

Automatic PDF delivery via SMS or WhatsApp

Error handling and fallback flows

Clean, modular workflow design (easy to extend later)

Nice to Have

Experience with healthcare or appointment-based systems

Prompt engineering for voice agents

Human-in-the-loop or confidence scoring logic

Logging and basic analytics (call outcomes, conversions)

Experience optimizing AI cost and latency

What I‚Äôm Looking For

Strong experience with n8n (non-trivial workflows)

Hands-on experience with Twilio + Vapi

Comfortable designing voice-first AI systems

Can think in flows, edge cases, and failure modes

Clear communicator who can explain architectural decisions

You will be asked these questions before applying.

Please include:

Relevant projects using n8n + voice AI

Your experience with Twilio and/or Vapi

A brief explanation of how you would architect this system

Any questions or assumptions you‚Äôd want to clarify

json.title: Full Stack Developer - AI Focused
json.description:
About Us
We run a growing affiliate lead generation business focused on several verticals. Our stack is built on automation, AI, and speed ‚Äî and we need a developer who can keep up and grow with us.‚Ä®
This isn't a "build it and forget it" role. You'll be building new tools, maintaining and improving our existing systems, and helping shape customer-facing software from the ground up. We move fast, test constantly, and want someone who takes ownership.

What You'll Be Working On
* n8n Workflows: Building, maintaining, and optimizing complex automation workflows ‚Äî this is core to how we operate
* Front-End Development: Building user-facing tools and internal dashboards (React, Next.js, or similar)
* AI/LLM Integration: Working with the Claude API, OpenAI, and other AI services to build intelligent features into our products
* API Integrations: Connecting and managing services like LeadByte, Retell, Unbounce, and others across our lead gen stack
* Backend & Data: Supabase, PostgreSQL, AWS (S3, Lambda, etc.) ‚Äî keeping our data layer solid and scalable

What We're Looking For
* Strong n8n experience ‚Äî you've built real, production-level workflows, not just tutorials
* Full-stack capability ‚Äî comfortable building both the front-end UI and the backend logic behind it
* API-savvy ‚Äî you can read docs, troubleshoot integrations, and connect systems without hand-holding
* AI/LLM familiarity ‚Äî experience building with Claude API, OpenAI, or similar. Bonus if you've used Claude Code or similar AI dev tools
* Self-starter mentality ‚Äî you can take a rough idea and turn it into a working product
* Obsessively curious about AI ‚Äî you genuinely enjoy spending hours learning new tools, testing new models, and staying on top of what's changing in the AI/automation space. This industry moves fast and we need someone who's excited by that, not overwhelmed by it
* Growth mindset ‚Äî you're not just looking for a job, you want to level up your skills alongside a growing business. We invest in the people who invest in themselves
* Conversational English ‚Äî enough to communicate clearly on calls and in async messages
* Available during US business hours ‚Äî real-time collaboration matters here

Nice to Have
* Experience with lead generation, digital marketing, or performance marketing tech
* Familiarity with Unbounce, LeadByte, Retell, or similar platforms
* Experience building SaaS products or internal business tools
* Comfort with Claude Code or AI-assisted development workflows

Why This Role
This is a long-term position with room to grow. You won't just be executing tickets ‚Äî you'll have input on what we build and how we build it. If you're looking for a role where you can wear multiple hats, work on interesting AI-powered products, and grow alongside a business that's scaling, we want to hear from you.
